archimate:Representation.name: Sovrin Provisional Trust Framework (SPTF)
archimate:Representation.documentation: The formal name for the first version of what is now the Sovrin Governance Framework. The SPTF was approved by the Sovrin Board of Trustees on 28 June 2017.
